name: Walnuts
properties: Part of Daily Dozen nuts and seeds
Best consumed whole rather than as butter
benefits: Walnuts are nutrient-dense nuts that provide healthy fats, protein, and fiber. As part of the Daily Dozen, nuts and seeds hit thirteen of the seventeen ideal weight-loss diet criteria. Walnuts specifically are rich in omega-3 fatty acids and support heart health and weight management.
amount: Part of 1 serving nuts/seeds daily (1/4 cup or 1 ounce)

quotes: Legumes, whole grains, and nuts and seeds together would hit fifteen, fourteen and thirteen, respectively. NUTS AND SEEDS checkbox in Daily Dozen. The classic Waldorf salad reimagined includes 1/2 cup/60g chopped walnuts.
